description: RISO Sludge Bed Cleaning-Gagetown, The Department of National Defence (DND) CFB Gagetown, NB has a requirement for the establishment of a Regional Standing Offer (RISO) for provision of all labour, tools and equipment required for the cleaning of twelve sludge beds and Geo-tubes, at Building N-5 located at 5 CDSB Gagetown on an as and required basis. All work is to be performed in accordance with the specifications for DND Job No. L-G2-5821/70 The Standing Offer will be based on an as and when requested basis from May 01, 2023 or issuance of the standing offer to March 31 2025.
